ygData.subject: Re: Netmasters and faction with deepwater knights
ygData.msgSnippet: I cant be sure, but try killing the heretic that spawns by the dock in Toxulia. Its a 7 minute spawn rate, and he drops a Lore Bones that you can run to Erudin
ygData.messageBody:
I cant be sure, but try killing the heretic that spawns by the dock in Toxulia. Its a 7 minute spawn rate, and he drops a Lore Bones that you can run to Erudin for a quest if youd like. Im not for certain killing Elial will give deepwater faction but I think so. If not it might've been the Kerran cat people on Kerra Isle.

Shannyn



>>> "Finrod-AV" <finrod@...> 02/26/00 05:33PM >>>
Hail !

I have the following problem. I hunted the netmasters for a long time and
when I had the 2 nets I tryed to turn them in to David in the paladin camp.
I first wanted to do it in wolf form because of the faction but I was
dubviosly to them that way. Since i am a HIE i am indif to them and so I
tryed it that way. Needless to say that it didnt work and I lost them both
(grrr).

Looks like I have to raise my faction with them. Anyone knows a way to do
so? I know of the pearl of odus quest, but the problem with it is that my
faction is too low to start the quest and so it doesnt work (I trzed it to
be sure).

I also tryed to kill the NPC swimmers (circle of unseen hand) there as
suggested elsewhere, but they dont raise faction with the knights.

So if somebody can tell me a way to raise a HIE faction with them, i would
be very thankfull.

Finrod
Solusek Ro Server
